features: ALCOHOL-FREE TONER: Purifies the skin by gently removing and cleanses dirt, makeup, and impurities from pores. For normal to dry or sensitive skin types.
TONES AND REFRESHES: Herbal extracts aloe vera, panthenol, sea kelp, and hyaluronic acid nourish and protect the skin while normalizing the skin's pH to 4.0-6.
NON-DRYING FORMULA: Unlike other toners, this unique alcohol- free toner does not dry out skin, it moisturizes and prepares the skin for a moisturizer.
COOLING AND REVITALIZING: Ingredients found in nature such as witch hazel, licorice root, grapefruit extract, lavender oil, and chamomile help to cool, and tone the skin.

PAIR WITH OTHER ITEMS: Earth Science will be your first choice for a variety of hair, skin, and body supplies for men and women! Choose between body wash, face cleanser, deodorant, shampoo, almond-aloe moisturizer, shower products, and many more!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Created By Nature, Perfected by Science Earth Science is dedicated to providing gentle, clean and effective skin, body and hair care solutions created with plant-powered ingredients from ethical sources for sustainability and wellness, naturally.

Hydrating Skin Care Heroes to Combat Dry Skin Products designed to care for dry and sensitive skin. Naturally gentle, emollient-rich formulas with fruit oils and soothing plant-extracts pamper your skin. Skin-restoring ingredients and refreshers revive the skin’s appearance, leading to a confident, younger-looking glow. Ideal for dry and sensitive skin types to promote a radiant complexion.

ADE Creamy Fruit Oil Cleanser Aloe Vera Complexion Toner & Freshener Apricot Night Cream ph Balanced ✓ ✓ ✓ Plant-Based Ingredients ✓ ✓ ✓ Hyaluronic Acid for Moisture ✓ ✓ ✓ Skin-Softening Formula ✓ ✓ ✓ Revitalizes and Protects ✓ ✓ ✓ Hydrates and Nourishes ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tried others, they don't compare
reviews.reviewText: I use this toner after washing my face before bed (and before adding the Earth Science Almond moisturizer) and to freshen up first thing in the morning. I have to say it has almost become addicting! I cannot sleep until my face is clean and I don't feel fresh in the morning till I have used my toner. I cannot find this in stores near me anymore so I tried another similar toner (another brand) and it left a film on my face! This toner does not do that, you feel clean and refreshed. It is not over-drying (I have very dry skin) and it have evened out my skin tone soo much! I am fair skinned with lots of freckles and sun damage. After using this for about 8-9 months I don't have to wear foundation anymore! I put on a tinted moisturizer, some concealer under the eyes and I am good to go! LOVE IT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pre-primer, Toner, Astringent AND makeup remover all in one. Daily use!
reviews.reviewText: Probably one of the best toners I've ever used. Used daily with no adverse effects. No weird tingle. Makes my dry/combination skin feel refreshed before putting on makeup. Most of all, it does not leave me with dry patches! Since my skin is mostly dry, I'm prone to scaly skin during the winter months. This is a very hydrating toner packed with healing aloe vera that not only refreshes but moisturizes the skin and cleans out dirty pores. I even mix this toner with some almond oil to use as a makeup remover! Very safe, very natural (you can also find it at Sprout's grocery store) and perfect pre-primer toner for a day out. I blot some of this onto a cotton round pad or two and use circular motions on my face AND neck. Thanks for the great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been using this on my face for years. Only thing that works great. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great addition to your skincare routine
reviews.reviewText: I have only recently begun to take care of my skin. My mom gifted me a bottle of this toner and I immediately fell in love. This toner doesn't dry out your skin like other toners and it smells great. I do feel that it works a bit different than the orginal bottle I had but the bottle was very old. Perhaps they updated their formula.Pros- moisturizing unlike any other toner- actually smells decent- works wonders on my bumpy skin- evens out my complexion- drys quickCons- the lid of bottle sometimes gets crusted but I am messy when administering the toner- it seems a bit different than the orginal bottle I had

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is the only toner I like for my very sensitive skin. Any slightly nefarious ingredients, especially alcohol, will leave my face red and irritated, so I was happy to finally find a toner that my skin likes. At night I use it after washing my face and it removes the last residue in a very satisfying way. Somehow it really does 'prepare' the skin in a way that makes moisturizer more effective. Sometimes I use it mid-day in place of washing to remove some oil from my face. Adding this toner to my routine seems to help manage my acne.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used to use this product for over 30 years and it was great. It had a very pleasant natural smell. This new version is absolutely disgusting! It has a very strong chemical perfume smell. Why have they ruined a great product?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: When I worked at Whole Foods, Earth Balance products came very highly recommended from folks in the Whole Body department and I couldn't agree more. If you have sensitive skin, the natural ingredients will not irritate like other brands. Their products are more than what you would spend for other brands, but it is well worth it and a little bit of the toner goes and long way--and it smells awesome! I have been without the toner for a couple months and just reordered and my skin has definitely looked a little under the weather, so I am excited to use it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2012
reviews.reviewText: The smell of most beauty products cause my sinuses to swell like an emergency raft. No such problem with this toner. I have combination skin that tends to be dryer in the winter, and it doesn't help that Texas is so windy and dusty. This is the first toner I have ever used, but it seems to be everything I could want in a toner. My lotion is finally penetrating my skin instead of floating on top or drying up, the ingredients aren't toxic and the price is right. I also recently began using Earth Science'a a-d-e cleanser on my face instead of Dr Bronner's miracle soap, and that is also helping me combat my mild winter dryness. I still use Dr. Bronner's as my 'everything else' soap. Seriously check that stuff out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I switched to Earth Science skin toner about 10 years ago and have been using it every day since. It freshens up my face and makes my skin feel hydrated, like a cold glass of water does to the body. I rarely use moisturiser anymore as the toner freshens me up every time.
